textContent:
first of all the reason why i can come to this is because of the impression my sister gave me of you, it seems you’re a man who’s willing to listen 

in my previous work experience… shuttle
in the work experience before that… autorec

why have i said all this? to portray that i can get things done intelligently, moreover, for most people it’s about being paid to
title: brief
textContentHtml:
first of all the reason why i can come to this is because of the impression my sister gave me of you, it seems you’re a man who’s willing to listen 


in my previous work experience… shuttle

in the work experience before that… autorec


why have i said all this? to portray that i can get things done intelligently, moreover, for most people it’s about being paid to
